value.title: Power BI Desktop And Role-Playing Dimensions: Can you do it?

value.title: Power BI Drillthrough Updates
value.excerpt: Did you know there were Power BI drillthrough updates? In this video, Patrick looks at the drillthrough updates in Power BI Desktop.
